name: SAIYASASTRA
description:
This is a horror game. The plot is about Saiyasastra, the player must survive the ghosts.

---------------------------- ----- control button ------------------------------------

A : walk back 

D : Forward W : Jump / Warp to another level. 

E : Press to hide the character from the ghost. 

ESC : Enter the Pause Menu page/If it is in the Main Menu page, it will be pressed out immediately. 

 1: Grab a bottle of holy water. 

 2 : Open the message. Left Mouse Button : Throw a bottle of holy water (chasing ghosts / adding hearts)
